front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks -- Frame Replication and Elimination for Reliability

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks (virtual LANs)
front.abstract: This standard specifies procedures, managed objects and protocols for bridges and end systems that provide identification and replication of packets for redundant transmission, identification of duplicate packets, and elimination of duplicate packets. It is not concerned with the creation of the multiple paths over which the duplicates are transmitted.
